title: Dream Lover
alternative_title: How to catch up with you ; 怎样才能追到你 ; How Can I Catch Up to You?
status: How to catch up with you ; 怎样才能追到你 ; How Can I Catch Up to You?
description:
Description :
        I grew up with a crazy crush on the boy next door, but he moved away and I never heard from him. Unexpectedly, one day we actually met again at the university, and he became my teacher? How should I catch him in my heart?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 6: I Like Him More And More
Chapter 5: My Dream Guy, Please Go Out On A Date With Me
Chapter 3: Living Together With My Prince Charming?
Chapter 2: Gathering Up My Courage To Confess To My Prince Charming
Chapter 1: Meeting My First Love Again
Chapter 0: Gathering Up My Courage To Pursue You!
